channel.title: CVE Feed for webhuntinfotech -- Photo Video Gallery Master
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webhuntinfotech -- Photo Video Gallery Master

item.title: CVE-2024-5724|2024-06-20T14:06:06.230Z -- webhuntinfotech -- photo%20video%20gallery%20master
item.description: The Photo Video Gallery Master plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 via deserialization of untrusted input 'PVGM_all_photos_details' parameter. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject a PHP Object. No known POP chain is present in the vulnerable software. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it could allow the attacker to delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code.

item.title: CVE-2024-5724|2024-06-19T03:12:31.112Z -- webhuntinfotech -- photo%20video%20gallery%20master
item.description: The Photo Video Gallery Master plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 via deserialization of untrusted input 'PVGM_all_photos_details' parameter. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it could allow the attacker to delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code.
